title: Under the radar storylines
itunes:title: Under the radar storylines
description:
A room filled with some heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Colleen Wolfe – have the latest news surrounding the Aldon Smith arrest and subsequent release by the 49ers. The crew also takes you through some of the most impactful injuries around the league. Finally, the heroes break down the training camp storylines that are flying under the radar.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
